dcterms:creator: David Applegate
Robert Bixby
Vasek Chvatal
William Cook
dcterms:description: The Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP) is a classic optimization problem where the goal is to find the shortest possible route that visits a set of cities and returns to the origin city.
dcterms:title: Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP)

dcterms:creator: Paolo Toth
Daniele Vigo
dcterms:description: The Vehicle Routing Problem (VRP) involves finding the optimal routes for a fleet of vehicles to deliver goods to a set of customers, minimizing the total distance traveled while satisfying constraints.
dcterms:title: Vehicle Routing Problem (VRP)

dcterms:creator: Bruce L Golden
Larry Levy
Rakesh Vohra
dcterms:description: The Orienteering Problem (OP) is a routing problem where the objective is to maximize the total prize collected from visiting nodes within a given distance constraint.
dcterms:title: Orienteering Problem (OP)

dcterms:creator: Egon Balas
dcterms:description: The Prize Collecting TSP (PCTSP) is a variant of the TSP where each node has a prize and a penalty for not visiting it, aiming to maximize the total prize collected while minimizing the tour length.
dcterms:title: Prize Collecting TSP (PCTSP)

dcterms:creator: Alina Ene
Viswanath Nagarajan
Rishi Saket
dcterms:description: The Stochastic Prize Collecting TSP (SPCTSP) is a variant of the PCTSP where the actual prize collected is uncertain and only revealed upon visiting the nodes.
dcterms:title: Stochastic PCTSP (SPCTSP)

dcterms:creator: Paolo Toth
Daniele Vigo
dcterms:description: The Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (CVRP) is a variant of the VRP where each vehicle has a limited capacity, and the goal is to minimize the total distance traveled while satisfying demand constraints.
dcterms:title: Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (CVRP)

dcterms:creator: Paolo Toth
Daniele Vigo
dcterms:description: The Split Delivery VRP (SDVRP) allows for customer demands to be split across multiple routes, optimizing the total distance traveled while satisfying demand constraints.
dcterms:title: Split Delivery VRP (SDVRP)

dcterms:creator: Gurobi Optimization, LLC
dcterms:description: The Gurobi Optimizer is a state-of-the-art solver for linear programming, mixed-integer programming, and quadratic programming.
dcterms:title: Gurobi Optimizer

dcterms:creator: Google OR Tools
dcterms:description: Google OR Tools is an open-source software suite for optimization problems, including routing, scheduling, and linear programming.
dcterms:title: OR Tools

dcterms:creator: Michel Deudon
Pierre Cournut
Alexandre Lacoste
Yossiri Adulyasak
Louis-Martin Rousseau
dcterms:description: The Encode-Attend-Navigate (EAN) model learns heuristics for the TSP using policy gradient methods.
dcterms:title: Encode-Attend-Navigate (EAN)
